mapper.sql: ID, COMP_ID, CASE_ID, CASE_TYPE, SOURCE_ID, SOURCE_TYPE
mapper.insert:
SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()
insert into FUN_CUST_DEMAND_SPLIT
ID,
COMP_ID,
CASE_ID,
CASE_TYPE,
SOURCE_ID,
SOURCE_TYPE,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{caseType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mapper.update:
update FUN_CUST_DEMAND_SPLIT
COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SOURCE_TYPE = #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update FUN_CUST_DEMAND_SPLIT set COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SOURCE_TYPE = #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select top 4 c.BUILD_ID buildId,c.BUILD_NAME buildName,count(1) bulidCustCount from FUN_CUST_DEMAND_SPLIT a join FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER b on b.BUY_CUST_ID=a.CASE_ID join BUILDING_INFO c on c.BUILD_ID=a.SOURCE_ID where a.SOURCE_TYPE = 1 and a.CASE_TYPE = 3 AND b.${param.serchRange}=#{param.serchRangeId} AND b.BUY_CUST_STATUS IN (1,2,4) AND b.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} group by c.BUILD_ID,c.BUILD_NAME order by count(1) desc

select top 4 c.BUILD_ID buildId,c.BUILD_NAME buildName,count(1) bulidCustCount from FUN_CUST_DEMAND_SPLIT a join FUN_RENT_CUSTOMER b on b.RENT_CUST_ID=a.CASE_ID join BUILDING_INFO c on c.BUILD_ID=a.SOURCE_ID where a.SOURCE_TYPE = 1 and a.CASE_TYPE = 4 AND b.${param.serchRange}=#{param.serchRangeId} AND b.RENT_CUST_STATUS IN (1,2,4) AND b.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} group by c.BUILD_ID,c.BUILD_NAME order by count(1) desc
